item.title: Armadyl Godsword special...NPCs/Players?
item.dc:creator: @chris13 chris13
item.description:
@chris13 wrote:

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15333 && specialAmount <= 49) {//godsword specialDamage = 0; specialDamage2 = 0; sendMessage("You do not have enough special energy left."); } if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15333 && specialAmount >= 50) {//godsword startAnimation(2890); txt4 = "DIE NOOB"; string4UpdateRequired = true; RemoveAllWindows(); SpecialDamage = 75 + misc.random (30); specialAmount -= 50; }

This Spec For Armadyl Godsword works perfect…only hits the 90-105 on NPCs though seen as i have tested it on players and haven’t hit as high…(around 43)
How can i make it so the hits on NPCs also hit players?

Read full topic
